name: SAIB & Co. Inc.
description: Manufacturer of intimate cosmetics intended to tackle the entrenched cultural taboos around female sexuality. The company's offerings include sexual wellness products like a condom made from plant latex without unnecessary additives and artificial pigments designed from the perspective of women, enabling women to feel comfortable and proud to carry them without any shame or stigma.
one_liner: Manufacturer of intimate cosmetics intended to tackle the entrenched cultural taboos around female sexuality. The company's offerings include sexual wellness products like a condom made from plant latex without unnecessary additives and artificial pigments designed from the perspective of women, enabling women to feel comfortable and proud to carry them without any shame or stigma.
industry: Beauty, CPG (Consumer packaged goods), FemTech (women's health), Wellness, Social Impact
